observation: Abacus - Abacus Manufacturers, Abacus supplier And Abacus exporter  Send Email 08048968779 70% Response Rate Search Introduction What We Offer Contact Us Calculation Aids Student Abacus Teacher Abacus Abacus Kit Kids Abacus Abacus Books Face shield for covid 19 Welcome to Bharat Flow Controls Nature of Business Exporter and Manufacturer Total Number of Employees 26 to 50 People Year of Establishment 2000 Partnership Firm 2012-13 Rs. 2 - 5 Crore Approx. 32070***** 33AAIFB2599M2Z0 IndiaMART Trust Seal Verified We use qualitative raw material in the production process which is procured from reliable vendors. Some of our raw material includes wood, plastic granules, poly propylene, abs, nylon, HIPs, poly carbonate and styrene. Our wide collection of abacus for human brain development is available in categories such as student abacus, teacher abacus, mathematical abacus and many more. Our cutting edge technology in our production unit helps us to cater to the growing requirements of clients across the globe. Backed by our latest technology we are able to offer 50000 student abacus and 500 teacher abacus every month. Our capability in handling latest technology through our proficient professionals enables us to customize our range as per the client requirement and specifications. Our industrious professionals test our whole range at different stages to ensure durability, strength, thickness and size. more... Tell Us What Are You Looking For ? Thank you Showcase Gallery Contact via E-mail Contact via SMS K. Shanmughasundaram (Managing Partner) No. 7/44-2, Pappanaickenpalayam Road, Kanuvai Industrial Estate Coimbatore Call Us: Call Response Rate: 70% Share Us : F T L Company Presentation Company Video Company Brochure Home Site Map © Terms of Use IndiaMART InterMESH Limited

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain is legitimately registered to Bharat Flow Controls, with consistent details regarding the registrant's name, organization, address, and contact information. The domain has been registered since 2008 and is not set to expire until 2025. This longevity and consistency in registration details are positive indicators and not typical of scam websites, which often have recent registration dates or inconsistent information. To further validate the legitimacy of the website, I will check for any customer reviews or discussions related to the website.

thought: The testimonials page contains a variety of customer reviews with names and locations, along with a breakdown of ratings that show a majority of positive feedback. The presence of reviews from different locations and the specificity of product names lend credibility to the testimonials. Additionally, the distribution of ratings, including a few negative ones, suggests authenticity since scam sites often only have overwhelmingly positive and potentially fake reviews. There are no obvious signs of scam characteristics in the testimonials. With the information gathered so far, I believe I have enough evidence to make a determination on the legitimacy of the website. I now know the final answer Based on the analysis, there are no signs that https://www.bharatflowcontrols.net/ is a scam website. It has been established for a long time, has consistent and verifiable contact information, displays a legitimate business operation with a specific product focus, maintains a presence on reputable business platforms, and features believable customer testimonials.

observation.reason: The website has been in operation since 2008 with consistent registration details features a legitimate business operation with a specific product focus is associated with a reputable business platform (IndiaMART) has an ISO certification and authentic customer testimonials.
